title: Understanding the Difference
text: When you use 'merge and center', the selected cells are combined into one large cell. This can make it difficult to work with individual cells later.

title: Advantages of Center Across Selection
text: Centering across selection allows you to keep the individual cells intact while still centering the content across them.

hintAnswer: the earlier technique centered the title, but removed access to individual cells, because the cells were merged
